Write Mixture Data to File

Source: R/Final.R
write_mix_from_dataframe.Rd

Write Mixture Data to File

Usage

write_mix_from_dataframe(df, var_cols_mix, file_path = "hisea.mix")

Arguments

df

Data frame

var_cols_mix

Variables to write

file_path

Output file path

Value

None
